cast.name: 克里斯托弗·瓦尔兹 Christoph Waltz
科奈莉亚·弗洛波伊斯 Cornelia Froboess
克里斯蒂安·雷德尔 Christian Redl

director.name: 彼得·凯克勒维科 Peter Keglevic

this_title: Tag der Abrechnung – Der Amokläufer von Euskirchen
introduction: This movie depicts the story of Erwin Makolajczyk, a psychopath who killed 9 people in a courtroom on the 9th of March 1994. All of his life Erwin was a loner with a special liking for weapons. Finally he meets the older Lena to live with - but when she finds his weapons by chance one day, he beats her up. For this he's sentenced to pay her smart money - and Erwin cracks up...
chinese_title: Tag der Abrechnung – Der Amokläufer von Euskirchen
